tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Bafna for a tendon surgery, and I couldn't be more grateful for his exceptional care. From the initial consultation to the post-surgery follow-ups, Dr. Bafna's positive attitude and expertise were evident every step of the way.

Thanks to his skillful surgery and encouraging demeanor, I was able to return to work sooner than expected. Even during my recovery, Dr. Bafna was always available to answer questions and provide support, ensuring I stayed motivated and on track.

Now, I'm delighted to say that I'm back enjoying my summer vacations, fully recovered and feeling better than ever. Dr. Bafna is not just a great surgeon but also a truly helpful and inspiring doctor. I highly recommend him to anyone in need of orthopedic care. Thank you, Dr. Bafna!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Exceptional connect with his patients, he spends time to understand not only the physical problem, but also has advises on what we can do to reduce mental trauma. You need to visit to experience this ! .. Dr Bafna takes time to understand and describe what is needed to be done. He diagnosis and solutions are exceptional ‚Ä¶Thank you Dr to make the doctors visit ‚Ä¶ not .. like a doctors visit but a great meeting with a good friend ! ‚Ä¶ Best wishes always 
PS : this a  real review. By Ashish Tencheri

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Got to know about Dr. Lalit from Practo. He‚Äôs a very humble & polite person. He patiently listened to my problem & did a very good diagnosis. He goes to the root cause of problem & just not give medicines for symptomatic relief. 
I don‚Äôt write reviews, but must say doctor is amazing for truly diagnosing the problem.
We need more doctors like him.
5 stars.
God bless him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I just went to doctor twice..both the time his treatment was very precise and I was feeling better that day only, despite of my expectations..I am really thankful to you doctor for giving me right suggestion when I wanted to get an MRI done n on the contrary u said just take the medicines n believe me you will be fine till today's evening! And I was....thank you once again.

review: I can't thank Dr. Lalit Bafna enough for the exceptional care and expertise he provided during my patella fracture surgery. Thanks to his skillful hands and attentive post-operative care, I'm thrilled to say I've made a full recovery in just two months. Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Lalit Bhafna is an exceptional doctor who truly cares about his patients. His expertise in orthopaedics is evident in his thorough examinations and accurate diagnoses. He takes time to listen to his patients' concerns and explains medical conditions and treatment options in a clear and understandable manner.His support is throughout the treatment be it pre operative , during surgery and post operative. I highly recommend Dr. Lalit Bhafna to anyone in need of medical care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ust wanted to take a moment to share how thankful and indebted we are to Dr. Lalit for handling my wife‚Äôs ACL tear surgically. The first time we interacted with Dr. Lalit, I thought to myself, ‚Äúmy wife‚Äôs knee surgery could not be in better handsüòä‚Äù. The best thing about him is he took time to hear us, explained all our options in a very thorough, concise and empathetic manner and once a course of action was decided upon, everything transpired in a quick and efficient manner.  The one thing that differentiates him from other doctors is the level of compassion and sheer dedication towards his patients , never seen a doctor personally reaching out to follow up on the progress during the postoperative period from reviewing daily progress pictures to providing advise and attention to each details even a month after surgery. It has been a month now since my wife underwent surgery and she has completely recovered and able to walk pain free.  Again, extremely thankful and appreciative of Dr. Lalit , ** ** ****** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ***** ** *** **** **** ** *********** ******** I had been struggling with recurrent kneecap dislocations, and boy, am I grateful that the universe led me to him. My experience with him was off the charts AMAZING! Dr Bafna patiently listened to all my concerns and took his time to diagnose my condition accurately. I never felt rushed or ignored during my appointments. He made sure I understood every aspect of my condition and explained all the available options to me, leaving no room for confusion. He is not just an expert in his field; he also has a cool and calm personality that is helpful to anxiety-ridden patients like me! On the day of my ligament surgery, I was a bundle of nerves, but his calm and jovial demeanour immediately put me at ease. It made a world of difference to have a surgeon who not only knows what he's doing but also knows how to keep his patients relaxed.

Dr. Bafna's commitment to his patients is unparalleled. Throughout my recovery process, he was with me every step of the way. Just five days after my surgery, he got me started with physiotherapy, which played a significant role in my healing journey. His follow-up game is ON POINT! For the first two months after the surgery, he checked in on me CONSTANTLY (I'm not exaggerating), making sure I was committed to my physiotherapy and that my progress was on track. He pushed me when I needed it and praised me when I deserved it. I honestly doubt I would have put in 8-9 hours of physiotherapy every day if I didn't have such an amazing doctor cheering me on.

Dr. Bafna's skills, capabilities, and dedication to his patients are beyond impressive. I am eternally grateful to him for helping me regain my mobility and for being a source of unwavering support throughout my recovery. If you're in need of an orthopaedic surgeon, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Bafna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Lalit Bafna is one of the Great Orthopedic/sports injury Surgeon in delhi.After consulting many doctors in delhi I choosing Dr Lalit Bafna for my surgery is the best decision I have made. I have a complete acl tear with medial meniscus tear
and  my surgery is done by Dr. Lalit Bafna on 06.09.2023 surgery is done very smoothly . Recovery is going great. Dr.Lalit is very experienced and treat you like a family member. He will heal your half off injury with his kind words and Jolly nature. before and after surgery support is great.he used advance method implements with economic price. My surgery cost is below half of price where other hospitals are offered.SCI hospital environment and hygiene maintenance is awesome. Staff's (nursing) of the SCI hospital is really cooperative nature and carrying of the patient after surgery is really remarkable.Thank you, Dr. Lalit bafna, for all that you have done for me.I would highly recommend Dr. Lalit bafna to anyone in need of orthopedic and sports injury related surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently underwent hip joint surgery, specifically core decompression, performed by the highly skilled Dr. Lalit Bafna at SCI Hospital, and my experience was nothing short of outstanding. Dr. Bafna's unparalleled expertise and attention to detail instilled confidence from the initial consultation to the post-operative care. His ability to explain the procedure in a comprehensive yet accessible manner helped alleviate any concerns I had. Throughout the surgery, Dr. Bafna's precision and dedication to ensuring optimal outcomes were evident, and the results speak for themselves. The positive impact on my quality of life post-surgery is remarkable. What sets Dr. Bafna apart is not only his medical proficiency but also his genuine concern for the well-being of his patients. The entire team at SCI Hospital, under his leadership, contributed to a seamless and supportive environment. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Lalit Bafna for anyone seeking exceptional orthopedic care and a positive experience in hip joint surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a great experience with Dr. Lalit Bafna where he was quite humble, professional, friendly and proficient while listening to my queries related to the injury I had on my right knee when I visited him for the first time.

He checked my condition, went through my reports and guided me pretty well about the further action to be taken where it was decided to have ACL reconstruction Surgery.

The surgery was successful and the doctor didn‚Äôt even made me feel any kind of pain and was regularly interacting with me during the surgery and also explained me the process while showing it on the screen.

He is the best Orthopaedic Surgeon in Delhi and I would highly recommend everyone to reach out to Dr. Lalit Bafna if searching for an Orthopaedic Surgeon in Delhi or India.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a cartilage injury and partially torn ACL, but the treatment provided by Lalit sir was the best one.
Despite having both the injuries, I had started walking after 28 days and that too at a much lower cost.
The best thing is that, till the time you completely heal, the doctor is always with you.
You won't feel alone and all of your doubts regarding your healing you can ask.
You will rarely see these kinds of doctor.

Overall great experience and helpful consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Compassionate and patient doctor. Accurate diagnosis and medicines has helped in quick recovery. Dr. Bafna's precision and dedication to ensure optimal outcomes is very evident. And his action speaks louder than his words

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited Dr. Lalit Bafna for feet and leg swelling issue i had experienced before and for general health consultation. I had some doubts and questions and wanted to know the cause and remedies but i was not really happy or satisfied with his explanation and  left with my questions still unanswered. Maybe it was evening time and his visiting hours in the hospital was over because he seemed like he's in a hurry to end the session but i would really like to mention that Dr. Lalit Bafna is a gem of a person, i felt like i visited at the wrong hour otherwise, he is a very good person, he has all the qualities of a perfect doctor, he listens, understands, friendly, very decent, one best quality in him is he is very approachable person, you can be comfortable and express yourself without any formality with him and most importantly, he seemed very knowledgeable and talented in his field of specialization. I would highly recommend Dr. Lalit Bafna to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met with an accident around 3 months back in which my ACL and meniscus of right knee got damanged. I went to around 4 doctors but none of them was able to tell clinically what happened, but when i went to Dr. Lalit, by just seeing the knee he could tell what has happened. This describes the experience and professionalism very well. I had the surgery for this which the Dr. Lalit took care of everything from the hospital to post surgery things. He is very calm minded person and explained every bit of the surgery. Thanks to him that i am back to normal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had met with an accident and broke my foot. First i went to Max in emergency and senior doctor advised me foot surgery but haven't explained properly why it needed and and what will be the procedure etc. Then after I went to doctor bafna for the second openion after reading the reviews and really he explained it to me in detailed & he actually was so friendly and humbled 
always available on WhatsApp as well &  even he didn't charged his fees 3 times for pre & post surgery appointments. Advised best ways to gets the needed products also..Now posting this review after almost 2 months of surgery 
which was done by Dr Bafna in SCI Hospital and recovering fast So overall i found him same as per the reviews.. Highly recommended from my side.

Jatin Verma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After meeting many Doctor's in NEW Delhi and NCR, I met Dr Lalit Bafna.I was having Complete ACL Tear and Meniscus tear. I was scared of the procedure. Dr Lalit Bafna counselled me well and I felt confident after that. I underwent the procedure (Arthroscopic ACL reconstruction and Meniscus repair) and after two months now I am all good and perfect with my pain and instability. Very impressed with Dr Lalit Bafna's behaviour and the cost of treatment. He used the International implant's at economic price almost half of what other hospitals quoted me. He is very cooperative and kind. I strongly recommend him for sports injuries . Hospital staff(Nursing Staff, Receptionist etc) is also very good and infrastructure is amazing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** **** ************* *** very very friendly. Definitely not into money makin‚Äô by misguiding people. I went there to get my 3 year old daughter examined based on someone‚Äôs feedback about her walking style. The doctor made my daughter comfortable and examined her walking very patiently. After that we were clearly told that there is nothing to worry about and she has bit of a flat foot that‚Äôs just it. He didn‚Äôt take a single rupee even upon insisting and sent us off after recommending a Vit D3 supplement and exposure to sunlight. I would definitely recommend Dr Bafna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I met Dr Lalit for my mother's knee treatment. 
Referred by my neighbour.
He is highly qualified and fabulous doctor.

My mom fell down and got fractured in her knees. 
He explained the possible treatment option,
one for surgery and another was conservative approach.
He explained the pros and cons of both the way of treatment and opted for the later one. We were so impressed with his honest approach and solved all our queries politely. 

My mom is now able to walk without support and pain-free. Extremely satisfied with his treatment.

Professionally genuine and gives best advice .
I will recommend anyone with knee related issues to consult Dr lalit. 

Thank you doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I m suffering from immense pain in my knee from around 2 3 months and I'm just 18 ...So I get to know about Dr Lalit Bafna as he is renowned Orthopedic doctor as well as Surgeon so I visited him and as he diagnosed me we get to know that  the pain I m going through is not just a normal pain the main problem is that I have discoid meniscus that have only one solution that is knee surgery .... So I decided to do that as soon as possible .. he had done wonderful job as within 1.5 moths of my surgery I m back to my normal routine now able to walk or do things painfree ... I highly recommed dr lalit as he is both a good doctor and a helpful person as he connected with me till date .. Thank you and I wish him best future ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother is really lucky to have met Dr. Lalit in her life. Dr. sir is a life Saviour. he is very professional, very kind and very nice. He explains his patients everything thoroughly in a very calm manner. He has his own unique way of interacting with his patients. He will clarify all your doubts without looking at the clock. He is one Dr that I have met in my life, who is very true to his work. He is very patient and kind. I highly recommend him, we are very fortunate and lucky to have him in our life. he is truly printed a very respectable image of his in our hearts. thank you Sir for everything. I salute you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Lalit has met me thrice to give his expert consultation and helped me out of my prolonged illness.
I was suffering severe pain in my lower back and joints.
For last few years I was getting it treated thru best of the hospitals in Delhi, but of no help at all. Then I met Dr Lalit in Primus Hospital, Chanayaka puri. 
He has diagnosed the problem in the first meeting and shared his treatment plan. He not only explained me in detail but shared the different aspects of treatment.
I really admire him for his truthfulness and sincerity.
I highly recommend him for ortho related issues.

Vibha

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Found right surgeon at right time. I was diagnosed with damaged ACL and bucket handle tear in my knee and for almost 5 months i was searching for excellent treatment from a experienced surgeon. During this time period luckily i found out dr. Lalit bafna. He briefed me well about the problem, solution and the outcome. After the successful surgery, he shared his contact number to share every day status and progress of the treatment. I strongly recommend everyone who is looking for a professional surgeon.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Prior visiting Dr.Lalit Bafna, I had visited 17 Doctors at a stretch of 1 month. None of them, even though most of them were recommended by my known and some my tested ones, were unable to feed my unquenchable thirst for precise resolution to my knee injury. Yes it was an ACL complete torn, but none but Dr.Lalit had the perservance and skills to match the diagnose, elaborate and treat with utmost experience. Its been 10 days since surgery and I already started feeling like a man with new limb. Dr.Lalit I am thankful to you for your guidance and support all through the rough patches I had gone, especially after experiencing the non ethical practices by others. Sir you're bound to make a mark in the Medical History and I feel proud to be a part of that. Thank you Sir for being such a nice Human Being and thorough professional. I wish India had 100 more Doctors like you, we would have been medical superpower by now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My son's ACL reconstruction surgery was performed by Dr Lalit Bafna. Before surgery he explained all the minute details regarding surgery and thereafter rehabilitation. Surgery was performed as per his briefing. He even ensured that post operative stay of patient and the attended be as comfortable as possible. Even after 12 days of surgery he is constantly in touch with patient to monitor his progress. Dr Lalit Bafna is highly skilled in his job and take utmost care of his patient. He is very friendly in nature and a great human being.

review: Dr Lalit Bafna has great surgical acumen and also great human being.I went to him for a major fracture,fracture tibia and fibula.He kept on explaining every planned steps and procedures .He performed my surgery at Primus hospital and  after surgery and implant placement no one can recognize actual fracture site....post operatively he was very supportive  and he puts all his effort at comforting his patients at every visit.Our experience was great beyond our expectations and we are very grateful to him and his team.

tags: None

I finally got operated by him for my ACL tear and he explained EACH and EVERY minute detail about the surgery and the procedure and post operative rehabilitation. Its been 9 months to my surgery and I and I am back playing football for my college team. Kudos to Dr. Lalit Bafna and his meticulous surgical skills

review: I met Dr. Lalit for the operation of my husband's leg ligament. I am completely satisfied with my husband's operation. My husband recovered very quickly after the operation and with the suggestions given by the doctor. I would definitely like to say that Dr. Lalit is a very good surgeon as well as a good motivational person. Talking to him doesn't feel like talking to a doctor, looks like talking to a friend. Very polite nature. I will definitely recommend Dr Lalit. I want to thank you sir.

review:

My family was keen on getting a second opinion regarding surgery but I was sure that I was in safe hands and my decision proved right !!! 

Dr Bafna is not only a very skilled and dedicated doctor but a great human being too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am a senior citizen and we need a patient doctor to understand what we go through. Dr. Bafna is extremely polite, calm and gives ample time to understand and to explain the problem.
If you want to avoid surgery and want to recover with taking best precaution methods, please do visit this doctor.
He analyzed my reports and explained step by step what had happened to me and how I need to take care in future.
I highly recommend Dr. Bafna to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

The behaviour of the doctor made me feel really comfortable and optimist. Moreover he is easily reachable for any follow-up required during the treatment. Can't thank him enough for everything.

When I reached him with the issue, he explained me the issue very nicely and then explained about the diagnostic procedures very briefly. He also told me about the complications that I could have, but due to god's grace and expertise of Dr Lalit, I didn't have any. 

Post surgery and during the whole recovery period, he was very supportive. All thanks to Lalit sir, I am totally fine now and I feel better than before.
